00049 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 void CTxtMsgStatusDlg::DoDataExchange
00051     (
00052     CDataExchange * aDataExchange
00053     )
00054 {
00055     CDialog::DoDataExchange( aDataExchange );
00056     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_MSGSTATUS_TXT_ID, mTextMessageId );
00057     DDX_Text( aDataExchange, IDC_MSGSTATUS_TXT_STATUS, mTextMessageStatus );
00058 }
00059 
00060 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00066 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 BOOL CTxtMsgStatusDlg::OnInitDialog()
00068 {
00069     CDialog::OnInitDialog();
00070 
00071     mTextMessageId = mStatusEvent.msg_id.toCString( mCom.mClientCodepage );
00072 
00073     switch( mStatusEvent.message_status )
00074     {
00075     case MESSAGE_STATUS_UNREAD:
00076         mTextMessageStatus = _T("unread");
00077         break;
00078     case MESSAGE_STATUS_READ:
00079         mTextMessageStatus = _T("read");
00080         break;
00081     case MESSAGE_STATUS_NOT_FOUND:
00082         mTextMessageStatus = _T("not found");
00083         break;
00084     default:
00085         mTextMessageStatus = _T("invalid");
00086         break;
00087     }
00088 
00089     UpdateData( FALSE );
00090     return TRUE;
00091 }    /* OnInitDialog */
